synopsis.text: Manami and Harumichi Saitou, both deaf, navigate the joyous chaos of parenthood in the heartwarming anime series, Shuwawan!. The couple communicates with their two hearing children, the energetic three-year-old Itsuki and the adorable newborn Hotori, using sign language, or 'shuwa' in Japanese. Inspired by Harumichi's real-life experiences as a photographer, essayist, and father, the series is a charming adaptation of his Ikuji Manga Nikki (Child-rearing Manga Diary) work. Join the Saitou family as they share their unique and endearing family life in this delightful five-minute series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
